lead_paragraph: Mrs. Sabatini, who owned Sabatini’s restaurant, next to one of Donald Trump’s casinos, fended off condemnation proceedings that would have given the casino her property by eminent domain.
snippet: Mrs. Sabatini, who owned Sabatini’s restaurant, next to one of Donald Trump’s casinos, fended off condemnation proceedings that would have given the casino her property by eminent domain.

headline.main: Clare Sabatini Dies at 77; Beat Trump in Land Fight
headline.seo: Clare Sabatini Dead at 77; Beat Trump in Land Fight
headline.print_headline: Clare Sabatini, 77; Beat Trump in Land Fight
